name: Aria (leaves)
description:
Welcome to Aria!

You are put in an escape pod because of the explosion of the spaceship while you are space traveling and need to get back to the earth by flying to the space station and asking for help. You will be taught how to activate and drive the pod and the AI assistant - Aria will help you go through these.

However, on the way, disaster strikes, how can you overcome them and successfully reach the space station with Aria? You can find the answer in our game - Aria.

Working on program - beta
